message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $12,000. I believe it will be incredibly valuable for you, even more so than that price might initially suggest.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Can you meet me at that price?

Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but the value of this product is truly significant. How about we settle at $11,000? I'm confident you'll see a great return on that investment.
I appreciate your persistence, Alice, but I'm still not convinced that $11,000 is a good deal for me. Can you meet me at $9,500?
